statements: DELETE FROM movement_of_goods WHERE shipping_cost > 1000 AND destination_location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM transportation_routes WHERE distance_in_km > 100 AND estimated_duration < 60;
DELETE FROM goods WHERE id = 101 AND location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM tracking WHERE goods_id = 201 AND location = 'Dock B';
DELETE FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'New York' AND end_location = 'Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id = 100 AND receiver_id = 200;
DELETE FROM warehouses WHERE location = 'New York' AND availability = FALSE;
